column1: Table 2. Unadjusted violent victimization rates, by victim’s disability status and age, 2009–2012
Report title: Crime Against Persons with Disabilities, 2009-2012-Statistical Tables
Data source: BJS National Crime Victimization Survey and U.S. Census Bureau American Community Survey
Table 2. Unadjusted violent victimization rates, by victim’s disability status and age, 2009–2012
Note: Based on the noninstitutionalized U.S. residential population age 12 or older. Estimates were based on 2-year rolling averages. See appendix table 2 for standard errors.
Sources: Bureau of Justice Statistics, National Crime Victimization Survey, 2008–2012; and U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey, 2008–2012.
